Address.label: Address
Address.value: 9725 INDUSTRIAL DRIVE, BRIDGEVIEW, Illinois, 60455, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Manitex International Inc, through its subsidiaries, is engaged in the design, manufacture and distribution of engineered lifting solutions. Its products include boom trucks, truck cranes and sign cranes. The company generates a majority of its revenue from Boom trucks, knuckle boom and truck cranes. Geographically, it has a business presence in the U.S., Italy, Canada, Chile, France and other countries, of which it generates a majority of its revenue from the United States.
